blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The Lost Ones
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BHl34h

by silvermoon548

Artemis Markov grew up in the Facility. She was raised to be a hunter, a killer, a soldier, an assassin. Now that she’s free she can be whoever she wants. The X-Men have taken her in to become one of them, but is that what she really wants?

On this journey, Artemis will encounter loss, find love, and hopefully build a new life where she can be herself.

Words: 5132, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: X-Men - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/F, F/M
  • Characters: Rogue (X-Men), Jean Grey, Logan (X-Men), Bobby Drake, Kitty Pryde, Remy LeBeau, Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Tony Stark, Nick Fury, Original Female Character(s)
  • Relationships: female oc/ female oc, Jean Grey/Scott Summers, Bobby Drake/Kitty Pryde, Remy LeBeau/Rogue, Loki (Marvel)/Original Male Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Murder, Teen Romance, Kidnapped Kid, Family Reunion, Silent Character (for the most part)


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BHl34h

read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BHl34h

title: guys and dolls
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2DP3VtA

by throughthemist

“he turned his attention to the ice, totally prepared to pretend to be interested for another few minutes before he could go and finally, finally, get that food Nat promised.

But instead he kind of fell in love. Just a little bit.”

in which Bucky is an Olympic figure skater and Steve falls in love at first sight

Words: 5607, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of guys and dolls

  • Fandoms: Captain America (Movies), Yuri!!! on Ice (Anime), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply

  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Clint Barton, Victor Nikiforov, Katsuki Yuuri, Bruce Banner

summary: this is Laputa, a superhero who was exiled from her home-planet because she was too destructive. after being kicked to earth,...
caption:
this is Laputa, a superhero who was exiled from her home-planet because she was too destructive. after being kicked to earth, she was confused, so she attacked citizens out of frustration and anger. after getting word of her attacks, The Avengers fought her and easily subdued her.

after ‘rehabilitating’ her, she was made an Avenger. 


I ship her with Tony Stark or Thor, depending on my mood.

reblog.comment:

after ‘rehabilitating’ her, she was made an Avenger. 


I ship her with Tony Stark or Thor, depending on my mood.

after ‘rehabilitating’ her, she was made an Avenger. 


I ship her with Tony Stark or Thor, depending on my mood.

blog.name: shannonwhumps
blog.title: let's get whumpy;)
blog.description:
iron dad whump galore
masterlist, buy me a ko-fi?

title: shannonwhumps masterlist
body:
Here is a masterlist of my posts…if you’d rather me sort it a different way, let me know. 

Peter Whump:

  • “What day is it? What’s your name? Where are we?” (Now being written into a multi-chapter fic here)
  • “You thought I was finished with you, didn’t you? Oh darling, the game hasn’t even started yet.”
  • A whumpee who cries easily having their tears and emotions mocked by the people who beat or torture them. 
  • “I’m going to break your hand now. Please do try and keep the noise down.”, “The pain meds aren’t working! Don’t you hear him?”, “Bud, you can’t rest yet. Keep your eyes open.”
  • “Here, take my jacket. I’m not bothered by the cold anyways.” 
  • Peter is knocked unconscious in the airport battle (CA:CW)
  • Skip whump + protective Happy

Tony Whump: 

  • “H-hold on, t-t-they’re c-coming, okay?”, “You don’t get to quit on me!”, “Please, please, wake up. I can’t do this without you.”

Peter and Tony Whump:

  • “I - I don’t want - please, don’t, I don’t want to -” 
    “You’re a killer, aren’t you? You’ve done it before. Do it now, or your friend dies bloody.”
  • Tony can see Peter dying, but Peter can’t see him
  • Peter and Tony clinging to each other when someone tries to take Peter

Tags:

  • all writing

title: Avengers Fiction
body: Would anyone read a crossover fanfiction about how Tony Stark is Marcos Diaz’ father from The Gifted. Like how Tony is inspired to do the gauntlet from the bursts of light from Marcos? Like it would stark off in ironman or before the movie and then into the Marvel Universe

blog.name: scottishaccentsareawesome
blog.title: *Cue "Boys of Summer" Intro...*
blog.description: She/Her! MCU-addict (specializes in loving Tony Stark and the Stark Family, including but not limited to IronDad & Spider-Son and Pepperony)! Loves Harringrove and Stranger Things but doesn't have Netflix (figure that one out)! Loves Dean WInchester, Brooke Davis, Tony Dinozzo, Jake Peralta, Tahani Al Jamil, The Doctor, Han Solo, Jim Kirk, Kara Danvers, Barry Allen, and MOST of the characters that come with all of them!

tags: I know it's long but both of these scenes are so sweet I had to use both
summary: Tony: Steve and me, it didn't work out. Stephen: I'm sorry. Tony: Well,  I realized I had everything I ever wanted, but nothing...
body:
Tony: Steve and me, it didn’t work out.

Stephen: I’m sorry.

Tony: Well,  I realized I had everything I ever wanted, but nothing I really needed. And I think that what I need is here. And I came all this way to see if maybe you might think so too. And if you do… Well, I don’t really have any plans past that, which is new for me. So, Doctor Stephen Strange, and I should probably learn your middle name, here is my proposal. I propose we *not* make plans. I propose we give this thing a chance and let it work out how it works out. So what do you say? Do you want to *not* make plans with me?

Stephen: *confusion becomes amusement, and he walks away*

Tony: [gathers herself, and then to Wong] I guess that’s Mystic for “no”.

(Tony rushes out of the Sanctum)

Stephen(catches up with him): Mr. Stark, where the hell are you going?

Tony: You said no.

Stephen: I did not say no. I didn’t say anything.

Tony: You walked away.

Stephen: I was getting something

Tony: Really. That was a good time to go get something?

Stephen: Yeah, it was actually. I was getting this.

*pulls a ring from his pocket*

Stephen: I wouldn’t be holding this ring if it weren’t for you. I reject your proposal. I don’t wanna *not* make plans with you. I wanna *make* plans with you.

And if you do… Well, I don’t really have any plans past that, which is new for me. So, Doctor Stephen Strange, and I should probably learn your middle name, here is my proposal. I propose we *not* make plans. I propose we give this thing a chance and let it work out how it works out. So what do you say? Do you want to *not* make plans with me?

Stephen: *confusion becomes amusement, and he walks away*

Tony: [gathers herself, and then to Wong] I guess that’s Mystic for “no”.

(Tony rushes out of the Sanctum)

Stephen(catches up with him): Mr. Stark, where the hell are you going?

Tony: You said no.

Stephen: I did not say no. I didn’t say anything.

Tony: You walked away.

Stephen: I was getting something

Tony: Really. That was a good time to go get something?

Stephen: Yeah, it was actually. I was getting this.

Stephen: I wouldn’t be holding this ring if it weren’t for you. I reject your proposal. I don’t wanna *not* make plans with you. I wanna *make* plans with you.
